item.title: Coinbase 黑客利用贿赂来获取客户数据
item.description: 2024 年 3 月 4 日星期一，美国加利福尼亚州洛杉矶波旁室，Coinbase 全球公司首席执行官布莱恩-阿姆斯特朗（Brian Armstrong）在 "与加密货币站在一起 "投票集会上发言。加利福尼亚州的参议员竞选没有辜负其丛林初选的绰号，成为全美竞争最激烈的参议员竞选之一，其中包括加密货币亿万富翁捐赠者和一位前棒球明星球员。【原文：Brian Armstrong, chief executive officer of Coinbase Global Inc., speaks during a "Stand With Crypto" get out the vote rally at The Bourbon Room in Los Angeles, California, US, on Monday, March 4, 2024. California's Senate race is living up to its jungle primary nickname and turning out to be one of the most competitive in the nation, featuring crypto billionaire donors and a former star baseball player.】

item.title: 德鲁肯米勒在阿根廷 ETF 创纪录反弹后谨慎下注
item.description: 亿万富翁投资者斯坦利-德鲁肯米勒（Stanley Druckenmiller）的投资公司减持了部分追踪阿根廷股票的交易所交易基金，而在此之前，该基金在今年年初曾一度涨至历史新高。【原文：Billionaire investor Stanley Druckenmiller’s investment firm cut some of its holdings in an exchange-traded fund tracking Argentina stocks, after a rally that took it to an all-time high at the start of this year.】

item.title: 能源交易商数十亿美元砸向金属市场，LME寻求遏制大额赌注
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所（London Metal Exchange）正在讨论对大额头寸实施限制，禁止最近几个月震撼市场的大额押注。【原文：The London Metal Exchange is discussing imposing curbs on big positions that would outlaw the sort of outsized bets that have rocked the markets in recent months.】

item.title: 莱恩称欧洲央行将在六月预测中纳入贸易情景
item.description: 欧洲央行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，欧洲央行将在下月发布季度展望报告的同时，公布更多的欧元区经济情景，以试图捕捉当前贸易动荡可能造成的影响。【原文：The European Central Bank will publish additional scenarios for the euro-zone economy alongside next month’s quarterly outlook in an attempt to capture the possible effects of the current trade turmoil, according to Chief Economist Philip Lane.】

item.title: 伯南克敦促美联储采用 "另类 "预测方案
item.description: 前美联储主席本-伯南克（Ben S. Bernanke）敦促美国央行向公众更全面地解释其利率决策，并对潜在的预测情景进行更丰富的研究。【原文：Former Federal Reserve Chair Ben S. Bernanke urged the US central bank to provide the public a fuller explanation of its interest-rate decisions and a much richer examination of potential forecast scenarios.】

item.title: MEG 能源控股公司抨击斯特拉思科纳公司 "可笑 "的收购要约
item.description: 一些 MEG Energy Corp. 股东表示，他们对竞争对手斯特拉思科纳资源有限公司（Strathcona Resources Ltd. ）的潜在收购要约不以为然。【原文：Some MEG Energy Corp. shareholders say they’re unimpressed with a potential takeover offer from rival oil producer Strathcona Resources Ltd.】

item.title: OpenAI 利用面向程序员的新人工智能代理向谷歌和 Anthropic 发起挑战
item.description: OpenAI 正在为 ChatGPT 用户推出一个新的人工智能代理，旨在帮助简化软件开发，因为该公司正在进入一个由初创公司和大型科技公司组成的拥挤市场，为程序员提供人工智能工具。【原文：OpenAI is rolling out a new artificial intelligence agent for ChatGPT users that’s designed to help streamline software development as the company pushes into a crowded market of startups and large tech firms offering AI tools for coders.】

item.title: 衰退风险又成了美联储的事
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 银行准备为 Flutter 意大利交易出售 25 亿欧元债券
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）和高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）是准备在下周发行约 25 亿欧元（约合 28 亿美元）高收益债券的贷款机构之一，为 Flutter Entertainment Plc 收购 Playtech Plc 的意大利博彩业务提供支持。【原文：Bank of America Corp. and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. are among lenders preparing to launch around €2.5 billion ($2.8 billion) of high-yield bonds next week, backing Flutter Entertainment Plc’s acquisition of Playtech Plc’s Italian gambling business.】

item.title: 教皇利奥的童年故居以 25 万美元的起拍价出售
item.description: 教皇利奥十四世在芝加哥地区的童年故居将在一场豪华拍卖会上出售，上周教皇利奥十四世的当选引发了拍卖热潮。【原文：The childhood Chicago-area home of Pope Leo XIV is being sold at a luxury auction following a surge of interest sparked by his election last week.】

item.title: 美元走软对经济意味着什么
item.description:
美国出口商将从货币下跌中获益，但消费者可能会感到吃力。【原文：

American exporters would benefit from the currency’s drop, but consumers could feel a pinch.

】

item.title: 拉托斯考虑北欧建筑公司森蒂亚（Sentia）IPO事宜
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，瑞典企业集团 Ratos AB 正在考虑将其建筑部门 Sentia 上市，这标志着北欧地区又一家潜在的首次公开募股公司。【原文：Swedish conglomerate Ratos AB is considering listing its construction arm Sentia, according to people familiar with the matter, marking another potential initial public offering for the Nordic region.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心因通胀降至历史最低点
item.description: 由于对关税的担忧与日俱增，美国消费者情绪意外跌至历史第二低水平，通胀预期攀升至数十年高点。【原文：US consumer sentiment unexpectedly fell to the second-lowest level on record and inflation expectations climbed to multi-decade highs amid growing concerns about tariffs.】

item.title: 巴西 Gol 公司获得 19 亿美元资金用于破产保护退出
item.description: 据一份文件显示，巴西航空公司 Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA 在宣布增资一周后，获得了 19 亿美元的承付款，用于资助其退出破产保护。【原文：Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA, a Brazilian airline, secured commitments for $1.9 billion to fund its exit from Chapter 11, according to a filing, one week after announcing a capital increase.】

item.title: 大型科技股上涨，美股微幅走高，有望实现周线上涨
item.description: 美国股市周五震荡走高，在过去四周中的三周内均实现上涨，因为投资者期待着今天上午稍后公布的消费者信心指数。【原文：US stocks drifted higher on Friday, on track for gains in three of the past four weeks as investors look ahead to a key reading on consumer sentiment later this morning.】

item.title: Pinterest 正在洽谈在纽约市麦迪逊 11 号大厦租赁办公室事宜
item.description: Pinterest 公司正在洽谈入驻曼哈顿麦迪逊大道 11 号的办公空间。【原文：Pinterest Inc. is in talks to take office space at Manhattan’s 11 Madison Ave.】

item.title: TikTok 提议与卢拉政府讨论巴西运营问题
item.description: 据一位知情官员透露，在巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）夫妇最近推动监管之后，中国社交媒体平台 TikTok 愿意与南美国家政府讨论其在巴西的业务。【原文：Chinese social media platform TikTok is willing to talk about its Brazil operations with the South American country’s government, according to an official with knowledge of the matter, following a recent push for regulation by President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva and his wife.】

item.title: 企业暂时消化关税，购物者躲过涨价潮
item.description: 尽管人们担心关税会给美国消费者带来痛苦，但迄今为止，购物者在结账时大多没有受到价格上涨的影响，或者说对价格上涨避而不谈。【原文：For all the worry about tariffs causing pain for American consumers, shoppers have so far been mostly shielded from — or shrugged off — higher prices at the checkout aisle.】

item.title: 谨慎的银行转向鲜有人使用的收购融资技巧
item.description: 上个月，随着贸易战的升级，债务市场关闭，华尔街银行深受其害，它们在为并购赢得融资业务的一些努力中承担的风险正在降低。【原文：Wall Street banks, stung by debt markets shutting down last month as trade wars escalated, are taking less risk in some of their efforts to win financing business for mergers and acquisitions.】

item.title: 欧洲领导人与特朗普通电话
item.description: 泽连斯基的发言人说，乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基、法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙、英国首相基尔-斯塔默、德国总理弗里德里希-梅尔茨和波兰总理唐纳德-图斯克与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普通了电话。【原文：Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy, French President Emmanuel Macron, UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer, German Chancellor Friedrich Merz and Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk spoke with US President Donald Trump on the phone, Zelenskiy’s spokesman said.】

item.title: TCW 债券老将瞄准落后于同行的 "IMF 候选者
item.description: 今年年初，大卫-罗宾斯（David Robbins）在黎巴嫩债务违约事件中收获颇丰，目睹了土耳其市场的内爆，并在厄瓜多尔选举中获胜。【原文：In a bumpy start to the year, David Robbins reaped gains from Lebanon’s defaulted debt, watched Turkey markets implode and saw wins from his election bet in Ecuador.】

item.title: 春季创纪录的干旱持续，英国供水减少
item.description: 随着半个多世纪以来最干旱的春季开始时间持续延长，英国各地的供水量正在下降，这加剧了人们对用水限制和干旱的担忧。【原文：Water supplies are dropping across the UK as the driest start to spring in more than a half-century continues to stretch out, reinforcing fears about usage restrictions and drought.】

item.title: 美国多户住宅建筑开工率上升
item.description: 由于多户住宅建设的回升抵消了单户住宅因库存增加而出现的下降，美国 4 月份的房屋开工率有所上升。【原文：US housing starts increased in April as a pickup in multifamily home construction more than offset a decline in single-family dwellings caused by elevated inventory.】

item.title: 游戏监管机构调查后，六家英超赞助商退出英国市场
item.description: 在英国博彩监管机构对其许可合作伙伴进行调查后，赞助英国足球超级联赛俱乐部的六家博彩网站已停止在英国的业务。【原文：Six betting websites that sponsor UK Premier League football clubs have ceased their UK operations after an investigation by the country’s gambling regulator into their licensing partner.】

item.title: 诺沃格拉茨的银河公司正与美国证券交易委员会商讨股票代币化事宜
item.description: 亿万富翁迈克尔-诺沃格拉茨（Michael Novogratz）表示，银河数字控股有限公司（Galaxy Digital Holdings Ltd.）正在与美国证券交易委员会商讨利用其数字资产平台将自己的股票和其他股票代币化的事宜。【原文：Billionaire Michael Novogratz said Galaxy Digital Holdings Ltd. is talking with the US Securities and Exchange Commission about tokenizing its own stock as well as other equities using its digital-asset platform.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚在紧张的总统选举前维持利率不变
item.description: 罗马尼亚央行维持借贷成本不变，就在总统决选前几天，在经历了数月的政治动荡和市场大跌之后，总统决选可能决定解决预算危机的前景。【原文：Romania’s central bank kept borrowing costs unchanged just days before a presidential runoff that may determine prospects for tackling a budget crisis after months of political turmoil and a market selloff.】

item.title: 法国制片人以《权力的游戏》为灵感的史诗片征服好莱坞
item.description:
他的教父是弗朗西斯-福特-科波拉（Francis Ford Coppola），他的家族是法国电影皇室，但迪米特里-拉萨姆（Dimitri Rassam）说，他正在开辟自己的道路，计划制作一部全球大片

。【原文：

His godfather is Francis Ford Coppola and his family is French cinema royalty, but Dimitri Rassam says he’s carving his own path with plans to make a global blockbuster

】

item.title: 天然气发电价格过高，埃及转向廉价石油
item.description: 由于天然气成本高昂，埃及正在购买大量石油来运行其发电厂，这使得这个中东国家不得不重新购买能源原料。【原文：Egypt is buying large amounts of oil to run its power plants as the high cost of natural gas redraws the Middle East country’s purchases of energy feedstocks.】

item.title: 穆迪警告：南非 Transnet 公司即将耗尽现金
item.description: 据穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）称，除非获得政府救助，否则南非国有运输和物流公司 Transnet SOC Ltd. 将在三个月内耗尽运营和偿债资金。【原文：South Africa’s state-owned transport and logistics company, Transnet SOC Ltd., will run out of money for operations and debt-servicing within three months unless it gets a government bailout, according to Moody’s Ratings.】

item.title: 阿克曼称哈佛大学董事会全体成员需要辞职
item.description: 比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）要求哈佛大学公司（监管学校的强大机构）董事会全体成员辞职，声称 "他们正在主持摧毁这所曾经伟大的学府"。【原文：Bill Ackman called for the resignation of the entire board of the Harvard Corp., the powerful body that oversees the school, claiming that “they are presiding over the destruction of this once great institution.”】
